Uses of Interface
fr.cnrs.iees.uit.space.Point

  • Packages that use Point 
    Package Description
    fr.cnrs.iees.uit.indexing
    The IndexingTree interface (representing a generic k-d tree) and different kinds of implementation.
    fr.cnrs.iees.uit.indexing.location
    A little auxiliary package for classes used to discretize continuous coordinates based on a given precision.
    fr.cnrs.iees.uit.space
    Basic geometric classes internally used by IndexingTree.

      java.util.Collection<T> LimitedPrecisionIndexingTree.getNearestItems​(Point at, int rank)
      Returns nearest items up to rank, e.g. if rank = 3 return the nearest items, the 2nd nearest items and the 3rd nearest item as a flat list.

      Methods in fr.cnrs.iees.uit.indexing.location with parameters of type Point 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Locator LocatorFactory.newLocator​(Point P)
      Converts a point to a locator with given precision (means all coordinates of P are truncated to 1/precision and transformed into longs).
